com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class ExplicitReconciler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.ExplicitReconciler

  • public class ExplicitReconciler
extends java.lang.Object
    Synchronizes the service's task state with what Mesos reports, with Mesos as source of truth. This differs from Implicit Reconciliation in two ways:
    • Explicit Reconciliation is tied to a specific set of tasks, and is therefore service-specific rather than framework-wide.
    • While Implicit Reconciliation is run periodically on a timer, Explicit Reconciliation is only performed once on service startup.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExplicitReconciler

        public ExplicitReconciler(StateStore stateStore)

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts reconciliation against the provided tasks, which should represent what the Scheduler currently knows about task status.

        NOTE: THIS CALL MUST BE THREAD-SAFE AGAINST OTHER RECONCILER CALLS

      • reconcile

        public void reconcile()
        This function is expected to be called repeatedly. It executes the following pseudocode across multiple calls: unreconciledList = tasksKnownByScheduler; // provided by the StateStore while (!unreconciledList.isEmpty()) { // explicit reconciliation (PHASE 1) if (timerSinceLastCallExpired) { driver.reconcile(unreconciledList); } }

      • update

        public void update(Protos.TaskStatus status)
        Used to update the Reconciler with current task status. This is effectively an asynchronous callback which is triggered by a call to reconcile().

        NOTE: THIS CALL MUST BE THREAD-SAFE AGAINST OTHER RECONCILER CALLS

        Parameters:
        status - The TaskStatus used to update the Reconciler.

      • isReconciled

        public boolean isReconciled()
        Returns whether reconciliation is complete.

        NOTE: THIS CALL MUST BE THREAD-SAFE AGAINST OTHER RECONCILER CALLS

      • remaining

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> remaining()
        Returns the list of remaining unreconciled tasks for validation in tests.

      • getCurrentTimeMillis

        protected long getCurrentTimeMillis()
        Time retrieval broken out into a separate function to allow overriding its behavior in tests.
